entry.title: New release for TRIP: 1.8.0
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for TRIP: 1.9.0
entry.content:
1.9.0

  • :sparkles::sparkles::sparkles: Alembic introduction

Config

  • :lipstick: Tiles can be customized in Settings (#9)
  • :sparkles: Default values for user creation configurable DEFAULT_TILE, DEFAULT_CURRENCY, DEFAULT_MAP_LAT, DEFAULT_MAP_LNG (see config docs) (#19)

Map

  • :lipstick: Places border is now based on Category color, can be customized in Settings (#15)
  • :lipstick: Display :compass: on places with GPX (#15) (Enable in Settings / Tweaks)

Trip

  • :lipstick: Create Place from a Trip (#20)

Misc

  • :sparkles: Parse Plus Code (#18)
  • :lipstick: Linkify links in descriptions and comments (#14)
  • :lipstick: Various UI/UX minor fixes (#17)
